TopicTitle: kerbal ballistic missile program mod dev

Articles.Content:
i have designed and created a model of a ballistic missile for the game, I need a unity developer to help me import these parts into the game.

the missile model consists of

one warhead

one guidance section

one stage separator

one fuel tank

and one liquid rocket engine

all pieces are individually textured

if you can help me get these models into a format that could be used in a mod please help

Edited March 31, 2014 by DURANDCREATIONS
Only post one thread at a time please.
I am now aware that textures need to be in specific dimensions, remapping textures currently
textures are now updated to work on ksp, this time i used square dimensions

I know about the part tools, my question was will anyone use those part tools to convert my models for the game? I am an artist not a unity developer, I create concept art, textures, 3d models, animations and designs. To make this extremely clear I do not work with unity for any reason. If you or anyone you know has both the time and skill to help me on this project I would be more than happy to add you to the kerbal ballistic missile program development team

I know about the part tools, my question was will anyone use those part tools to convert my models for the game? I am an artist not a unity developer, I create concept art, textures, 3d models, animations and designs. To make this extremely clear I do not work with unity for any reason. If you or anyone you know has both the time and skill to help me on this project I would be more than happy to add you to the kerbal ballistic missile program development team

...you're coming across as very anti-Unity :|

I've got my hands tied with my own mod, but honestly, it takes probably 2 hours max to sit down and get familiar with the program. I'm a modeller\texturer by trade and i felt exactly the same at the start, but if anything its just another skill under your belt. Knowing it makes the development process a lot easier too, because if you're trying to import the part in at a certain scale, you'll be doing imports and exports dozens of times. Its a trial-and-error process and if you're going to depend on other people for that job, it will slow down the development of your mod immensely.
Why does the rocket look like it has a car engine on it?
Because i used parts of a car engine in the texture for the rocket engine, these are just stand in texture currently
So.... will this come with a plug-in to set a specific target? That would be awesome!1!
of course, but i will need someone who knows how to program that
